title: Fall Away
description: Haunted by her past, Kimber dreams of a new beginning. A future of possibilities without the murderess threats of Alexandria and the disapproval from Leo’s family council. But when Wyler is attacked by an unforeseeable enemy, Kimber must go looking for the one thing all Pures will kill for. The First Fallen. Alliances will shift. Secrets will break the bonds that hold, testing Kimber like never before. Will Lena’s predictions come in time? And if so, will they be enough to save Kimber?
author: 🍀Sarah🍀
